attributes.action: reject unconditionally  Recommendation 14 or the Primary Curriculum Review which proposes  the lowering of school admission age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recommendation 14 of the Rose review of the Primary Curriculum proposes a single point of entry which would result in large numbers of children beginning school before they are developmentally ready to do so. It would also result in England being at the bottom of the league in terms of school starting age.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reject unconditionally Recommendation 14 or the Primary Curriculum Review which proposes the lowering of school admission age."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
